import React from 'react' export default function About() { return (

About MS Teams

This app is used to perform video chat between multiple persons. You have to create a Room Name and share that room name with your friend to chat. For securing and privacy of chat you can also apply password and share that password along with Romm Name to the person you want to connect.


Key Features of the App

  • You can On/Off your video as per your convenience
  • You can share your dextop screen with the person/persons in meet
  • You can chat with text also in the chat room
  • You can send invite to your friends with a link via mail
  • And Much More ðŸ˜Š
) }
